metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using Event Viewer RecentViews
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Event Viewer RecentViews

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\event viewer\\recentviews')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\eventv~1\\recentviews'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('>')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Event Viewer RecentViews
